Influencer marketing: Partnering with social media influencers to promote your brand to their followers.
User-generated content: Encouraging your followers to create and share content featuring your brand or products.
Hashtag campaigns: Creating a unique and memorable hashtag for your brand or campaign and encouraging your followers to use it.
Interactive contests: Running contests and giveaways on social media that require followers to interact with your brand or products.
Live streaming: Using live streaming on social media platforms like Facebook and Instagram to showcase your products or services in real-time.
